availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Born on December 23, 1823 in Kentucky. He was a Lawyer in Elkton, Todd County, Kentucky beginning in 1847. Died September 15, 1905 in Todd County, Kentucky.

bibl.p: Find A Grave, "Gobrias Terry (December 23, 1823 - September 15, 1905)," Memorial #48331639, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=48331639&ref=acom (accessed June 27, 2017).; Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Todd County, District A Ward 1, p. 413; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Todd County, p. 685.
